snippet: International aid agencies were preparing to begin emergency helicopter flights on Tuesday to the remote outer islands of Vanuatu, as the death toll from a cyclone late last week rose to at least 24.
abstract: Cyclone Pam strikes Pacific island nation of Vanuatu and kills at least 24 people, according to United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs.
lead_paragraph: International aid agencies were preparing to begin emergency helicopter flights on Tuesday to the remote outer islands of Vanuatu, as the death toll from a cyclone late last week rose to at least 24.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Vanuatu: Cyclone Toll Rises
